sense.def:
To insist that something is true
pomeni odločno trditi, da je nekaj res, in zavračati, da bi si premislili.

seg.quote: She insisted that Jim must leave.
‘But you know that she's innocent,’ the girl insisted.

sense.def:
To insist on something
pomeni trditi, da nekaj moramo storiti ali imeti.

seg.quote: He insisted on paying for the meal.
We were right to insist on reform.
